hero.title: Rwanda Media Project (RMP)
hero.subtitle: Professional film training in partnership with Media Education Babelsberg

intro.title: Building Rwanda's Film Industry
intro.description1: MEB CBC collaborates with **Media Education Babelsberg (Germany)** to implement the Rwanda Media Project (RMP), providing comprehensive professional film training in Rwanda.
intro.description2: This partnership brings world-class film education to aspiring Rwandan filmmakers, with a focus on empowering youth and women to build sustainable careers in the creative industry.

programs.title: Foundation Course
programs.description: Introduction to filmmaking fundamentals for beginners with no prior experience.

programs.title: Professional Certificate
programs.description: Intensive professional training covering all aspects of film production.

programs.title: Specialized Workshops
programs.description: Focused training on specific filmmaking disciplines and techniques.

testimonials.quote: The RMP training gave me skills I never imagined I could have. Now I'm working as a camera operator on international productions.
testimonials.author: Emmanuel, RMP Graduate 2023

testimonials.quote: As a young woman from a rural area, this opportunity changed everything for me. I now run my own video production business.
testimonials.author: Divine, Filmmaker & Entrepreneur

testimonials.quote: The instructors treated us like professionals from day one. That confidence has stayed with me throughout my career.
testimonials.author: Patrick, Documentary Filmmaker
